title: My Daughter Saw Her Father Assault Me
description:
In today’s episode, we talk with a mom worried about her daughter who’s become overly protective of her body after witnessing assault, a man unable to let go after his wife left him a year ago, and a police officer processing the Uvalde shooting.
Lyrics of the Day: "Running Up That Hill" - Kate Bush

Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
 Support Our Sponsors:
